description.english: See The Sun one last time.
description.french: Admirez le Soleil une dernière fois.
description.german: Sieh die Sonne ein allerletztes Mal
description.spanish: Contempla el sol por última vez.
description.portuguese: Vê o Sol uma última vez
description.schinese: 最后一次见到太阳
description.tchinese: 最後一次見到太陽
description.japanese: 最後にザ・サンに合う

description.english: Find the Gravekeeper in every chapter.
description.french: Trouvez le fossoyeur dans tous les chapitres.
description.german: Finde den Grabwächter in allen Kapiteln
description.spanish: Encuentra al sepulturero en todos los capítulos.
description.portuguese: Encontra o Coveiro em todos os capítulos
description.schinese: 在所有章节中都找到墓地看守人
description.tchinese: 在所有章節中都找到墓地看守人
description.japanese: すべてのチャプターでグレイヴキーパーを見つける

description.english: Gather all the mementos.
description.french: Récupérez tous les souvenirs.
description.german: Sammle alle Andenken
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los recuerdos.
description.portuguese: Reúne todas as lembranças
description.schinese: 收集所有纪念品
description.tchinese: 收集所有紀念品
description.japanese: すべての記念品を集める

description.english: Send a zombie back to sleep.
description.french: Contraignez un zombie à se rendormir aussi vite qu'il s'est réveillé.
description.german: Schicke einen Zombie zurück in den Schlaf
description.spanish: Haz que un zombi se vuelva a dormir.
description.portuguese: Faz um zombie voltar a dormir
description.schinese: 让僵尸再次入睡
description.tchinese: 讓僵屍再次入睡
description.japanese: ゾンビを再び眠らせる

displayName.english: To Zom-be or not to Zom-be
displayName.french: To zombie or not to zombie
displayName.german: Tot sein oder nicht tot sein
displayName.portuguese: Ser zombie ou não ser zombie

description.english: Witness a Shakespearean performance by a zombie.
description.french: Assistez à un monologue shakespearien d'outre-tombe.
description.german: Beobachte eine Shakespeare’sche Darbietung eines Zombies
description.spanish: Presencia la actuación shakesperiana de un zombi.
description.portuguese: Assiste a uma atuação shakespeariana de um zombie
description.schinese: 观看僵尸表演的莎士比亚剧目
description.tchinese: 觀看僵屍表演的莎士比亞劇目
description.japanese: ゾンビのパフォーマンスを見たシェイクスピアの劇

description.english: Play a good old record.
description.french: Écoutez une mélopée d'antan.
description.german: Spiele eine alte Platte ab
description.spanish: Haz sonar un vinilo antiguo.
description.portuguese: Toca um bom disco antigo
description.schinese: 播放老唱片
description.tchinese: 播放老唱片
description.japanese: 古いレコードを再生する

description.english: Eavesdrop on the Machiavellian plans of Nena's uncle.
description.french: Espionnez l'oncle de Nena pour être au fait de ses derniers plans machiavéliques.
description.german: Belausche die machiavellistischen Pläne von Nenas Onkel
description.spanish: Escucha a escondidas los maquiavélicos planes del tío de Nena.
description.portuguese: Ouve os planos maquiavélicos do tio de Nena
description.schinese: 偷听妮娜叔叔的马基雅维利计划
description.tchinese: 偷聽妮娜叔叔的馬基維利計劃
description.japanese: ニーナのおじさんマキャヴェリの陰謀を盗み聞きする

description.english: Open a bathroom stall door and find yourself face to face with a busy zombie.
description.french: Ouvrez la porte des toilettes et tombez nez à nez avec un zombie fort occupé.
description.german: Öffne eine Toilettentür und finde dich einem beschäftigten Zombie gegenüber
description.spanish: Abre la puerta de un baño y encuentra dentro a un zombi sacando el mal que lleva dentro.
description.portuguese: Abre a porta de uma casa de banho e dá de caras com um zombie ocupado
description.schinese: 打开卫生间的门，与僵尸面对面
description.tchinese: 打開洗手間的門，與僵屍面對面
description.japanese: トイレの扉を開け、ゾンビと対面する

displayName.portuguese: Quem é que desligou as luzes?

description.english: Burn out the light bulbs using the generator in the school.
description.french: Utilisez le générateur pour faire griller toutes les ampoules de l'école.
description.german: Lass die Glühbirnen in der Schule mit dem Generator durchbrennen
description.spanish: Haz estallar las bombillas usando el generador del colegio.
description.portuguese: Queima as lâmpadas com o gerador da escola
description.schinese: 用学校的发电机烧毁灯泡
description.tchinese: 用學校的發電機燒毀燈泡
description.japanese: 学校の発電機で電球を焼き切る

description.english: In the forest, steal a fuse without stopping the wagons.
description.french: Dérobez un fusible de la forêt sans arrêter les chariots.
description.german: Stiehl eine Sicherung im Wald, ohne von den Wagen angehalten zu werden
description.spanish: Roba un fusible en el bosque sin detener las vagonetas.
description.portuguese: Na floresta, rouba um fusível sem parar os vagões
description.schinese: 在森林中偷取保险丝且不会停止小车
description.tchinese: 在森林中偷取保險絲且不會停止小車
description.japanese: 森で保険用のヒューズを盗み、小車を止めない
description.koreana: 차를 멈추지 않고 숲에서 퓨즈를 훔쳤습니다

description.english: Assemble a boat in less than 30 seconds.
description.french: Construisez un bateau en moins de 30 secondes.
description.german: Baue ein Boot in weniger als 30 Sekunden zusammen
description.spanish: Monta una barca en menos de 30 segundos.
description.portuguese: Monta um barco em menos de 30 segundos
description.schinese: 在30秒之内组装一艘船
description.tchinese: 在30秒之內組裝一艘船
description.japanese: 30秒以内に船を組み立てる

description.english: Score a basket.
description.french: Marquez un panier.
description.german: Triff den Korb
description.spanish: Anota una canasta.
description.portuguese: Marca um cesto
description.schinese: 投篮得分
description.tchinese: 投籃得分
description.japanese: バスケットボールの得点

description.english: Take a refreshing shower in the hidden refuge.
description.french: Prenez une douche bien fraîche dans le refuge secret.
description.german: Nimm eine kalte Dusche im geheimen Refugium
description.spanish: Toma una ducha refrescante en el refugio escondido.
description.portuguese: Toma um duche revitalizante no refúgio escondido
description.schinese: 在隐秘的藏身点中淋浴
description.tchinese: 在隱秘的藏身點中淋浴
description.japanese: 隠れ家でシャワーを浴びる

description.english: Get Gloomy crushed between two wagons. Zombie or not, that's gotta hurt.
description.french: Écrasez Gloomy entre deux chariots. Zombie ou non, ça ne doit pas être très agréable...
description.german: Lass Gloomy zwischen zwei Wagen zerquetscht werden. Zombie oder nicht, das muss wehtun.
description.spanish: Deja que dos vagonetas aplasten a Gloomy. Seas un zombi o no, eso tiene que doler.
description.portuguese: Faz com que Gloomy seja esmagado entre dois vagões. Zombie ou não, isso deve doer.
description.schinese: 格洛米被两辆车夹在中间，无论是不是僵尸，这都很痛。
description.tchinese: 格洛米被兩輛車夾在中間，無論是不是僵屍，這都很痛。
description.japanese: グローミーが2台の車の間に挟まれた、ゾンビであっても痛いことには変わりない
description.koreana: 글루미가 차 두 대 사이에 끼어 있네요. 좀비든 아니든, 정말 아프겠네요.

displayName.japanese: 一緒にロックンロール

description.english: Make the boat's water wheel roll for at least 2 seconds.
description.german: Lass das Wasserrad mindestens 2 Sekunden lang rollen.
description.french: Faites rouler la roue du bateau pendant au moins deux secondes.
description.spanish: Haz que la rueda hidráulica gire durante, al menos, dos segundos.
description.schinese: 水轮滚动至少2秒
description.tchinese: 水輪滾動至少2秒
description.japanese: 水車が少なくとも2秒間回転し続ける
description.portuguese: Faz rodar a roda do leme do barco durante, pelo menos, 2 segundos.

displayName.german: Wir sind hier nicht in Texas
displayName.japanese: これがテキサスじゃない

description.english: Ride a moving carousel horse with Nena.
description.french: Montez sur un cheval du carrousel avec Nena.
description.german: Reite mit Nena auf einem Karussellpferd
description.spanish: Monta en un caballo del tiovivo con Nena.
description.portuguese: Anda num cavalo do carrossel em movimento com a Nena
description.schinese: 和妮娜一起坐旋转木马
description.tchinese: 和妮娜一起坐旋轉木馬
description.japanese: ニーナと一緒にメリーゴーランドに乗る

description.english: Hit at least 3 Cultists with a shockwave.
description.french: Provoquez une onde de choc et touchez au moins trois adeptes.
description.german: Triff mindestens 3 Kultisten mit einer Schockwelle
description.spanish: Golpea a un mínimo de tres sectarios con una sola sacudida.
description.portuguese: Atinge, pelo menos, 3 Cultistas com uma onda de choque
description.schinese: 用冲击波击中至少3个教徒
description.tchinese: 用衝擊波擊中至少3個教徒
description.japanese: 衝撃波で少なくとも3人の教団員を打つ

description.english: Finish a fight without taking damage.
description.french: Terminez un combat sans avoir subi le moindre dégât.
description.german: Beende einen Kampf, ohne Schaden genommen zu haben
description.spanish: Termina un combate sin recibir daño.
description.portuguese: Termina uma luta sem sofrer danos
description.schinese: 不受伤完成战斗
description.tchinese: 不受傷完成戰鬥
description.japanese: 戦闘中に傷を受けずに完了する

description.english: During a fight, see death up close and live to tell the tale.
description.french: Survivez in extremis à un combat.
description.german: Komme in einem Kampf dem Tode nahe und überlebe trotzdem
description.spanish: Quédate a nada de morir durante un combate y vive para contarlo.
description.portuguese: Durante um combate, vê a morte de perto e vive para contar a história
description.schinese: 在战斗中亲历死亡冰幸存下来讲述这段故事
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中親歷死亡冰倖存下來講述這段故事
description.japanese: 戦闘で死の氷を経験し、物語を語る
description.koreana: 싸움 중에 죽음을 가까이서 목격하고 살아남아 이야기를 전했습니다

description.english: Find two lazy Cultists hiding and playing games in the forest.
description.french: Débusquez deux adeptes qui jouent dans la forêt au lieu de travailler.
description.german: Finde zwei arbeitsscheue Kultisten, die sich im Wald verstecken und Spiele spielen
description.spanish: Encuentra a dos sectarios perezosos jugando y escondiéndose en el bosque.
description.portuguese: Encontra dois Cultistas preguiçosos escondidos e a brincar na floresta
description.schinese: 在森林中找到两个在玩游戏的懒惰教徒
description.tchinese: 在森林中找到兩個在玩遊戲的懶惰教徒
description.japanese: 森でゲームをしている2人の怠け者の教団員を見つける
description.koreana: 숲에서 게임을 하는 게으른 광신도 두 명을 찾았습니다

description.english: Reach the boat rudder without breaking the wooden planks.
description.french: Atteignez le gouvernail sans casser les planches en bois.
description.german: Erreiche das Ruder des Bootes, ohne die hölzernen Planken zu zerbrechen
description.spanish: Llega hasta el timón sin romper las tablas de madera.
description.portuguese: Chega ao leme do barco sem partir as tábuas de madeira
description.schinese: 在不打破木板的情况下达到船舵
description.tchinese: 在不打破木板的情況下達到船舵
description.japanese: 木板を壊さずに舵に到達する

description.english: Take a full ride with Gloomy and Nena in the same Ferris wheel cabin.
description.french: Laissez Gloomy et Nena partager une cabine et faire un tour complet sur la grande roue.
description.german: Fahre mit Gloomy und Nena in einer Gondel eine ganze Runde Riesenrad
description.spanish: Completa un viaje en la noria con Gloomy y Nena en la misma cabina.
description.portuguese: Dá uma volta completa com Gloomy e Nena na mesma cabine da roda gigante
description.schinese: 与格洛米和妮娜在同一个摩天轮厢中游览一整圈
description.tchinese: 與格洛米和妮娜在同一個摩天輪廂中遊覽一整圈
description.japanese: グローミーとニーナと一緒に観覧車に乗って一周楽しむ
description.koreana: 그로미와 니나와 함께 같은 관람차에 탑승해 완벽한 여행을 즐겼습니다

description.english: Survive the laser canon... for just a bit longer.
description.french: Survivez au canon laser... encore un peu...
description.german: Überlebe die Laserkanone ... nur ein kleines bisschen länger
description.spanish: Sobrevive al cañón láser... solo un poco más.
description.portuguese: Sobrevive ao canhão laser... só mais um bocadinho
description.schinese: 在激光炮中生存……或坚持得久一点
description.tchinese: 在雷射炮中生存……或堅持得久一點
description.japanese: レーザー砲で生き残る…または少しでも長く生き延びる
description.koreana: 레이저 캐논에서 살아남았습니다... 아니면 더 오래 버텼습니다.

displayName.english: The Quickest Claw in the West
displayName.spanish: La zarpa más rápida del oeste
displayName.portuguese: A garra mais rápida do Oeste

description.english: Hit a metal block back before it touches the ground.
description.french: Repoussez un bloc de métal avant qu'il ne touche le sol.
description.german: Schmettere einen Metallklotz zurück, bevor er den Boden berührt
description.spanish: Golpea un bloque metálico otra vez antes de que caiga al suelo.
description.portuguese: Acerta num bloco de metal antes que ele toque no chão
description.schinese: 在金属块触地前将其打回去
description.tchinese: 在金屬塊觸地前將其打回去
description.japanese: 金属の塊が地面に触れる前にそれを打ち返す
description.koreana: 땅에 닿기 전에 금속 블록을 뒤로 쳤습니다

description.english: Fall off a cliff in the mountains.
description.french: Tombez d'une falaise dans les montagnes.
description.german: Falle von einem Felsvorsprung in den Bergen
description.spanish: Cae por un barranco de las montañas.
description.portuguese: Cai de um penhasco nas montanhas
description.schinese: 从山崖上坠落
description.tchinese: 從山崖上墜落
description.japanese: 崖から落ちる

displayName.spanish: El diablo se viste de nada

description.english: Make Gloomy get to a pentagram. What could possibly go wrong?
description.french: Menez Gloomy jusqu'à un pentagramme. Tout va bien se passer...
description.german: Lass Gloomy auf ein Pentagramm treten. Was soll schon schiefgehen?
description.spanish: Haz que Gloomy llegue hasta un pentáculo. ¿Qué puede salir mal?
description.portuguese: Faz com que Gloomy chegue a um pentagrama. O que é que pode correr mal?
description.schinese: 让格洛米抵达五芒星，会发生什么呢？
description.tchinese: 讓格洛米抵達五芒星，會發生什麼事呢？
description.japanese: グローミーが五芒星に到達すると、何が起こるのか？

displayName.japanese: ゆっくりお帰りください

description.english: Dispose of some of the devices in the workshop.
description.french: Faites un peu de ménage parmi les machines de l'atelier.
description.german: Entsorge einige der Gerätschaften aus der Werkstatt
description.spanish: Deshazte de algunos de los dispositivos del taller.
description.portuguese: Elimina alguns dos aparelhos na oficina
description.schinese: 推开工坊中部分设施
description.tchinese: 推開工坊中部分設施
description.japanese: 工房内の一部施設を押し退ける

displayName.schinese: 错误的时间，错误的地点
displayName.tchinese: 錯誤的時間，錯誤的地點
displayName.japanese: 間違った時間、間違った場所

description.english: Crush Nena under a falling wagon. Remind me, who's the bad guy here again?
description.french: Écrasez Nena sous un chariot en chute libre. Vous ne travailleriez pas avec le Prêtre, par hasard ?
description.german: Zerquetsche Nena unter einem fallenden Wagen. Wer war hier noch mal der Bösewicht?
description.spanish: Deja que le caiga una vagoneta encima a Nena. A ver, ¿quién es el villano de esta historia?
description.portuguese: Esmaga a Nena debaixo de um vagão a cair. Relembra-me, quem é o mau da fita aqui?
description.schinese: 掉落的小车压死妮娜。看看，谁才是这里的坏人？
description.tchinese: 掉落的小車壓死妮娜。看看，誰才是這裡的壞人？
description.japanese: 落ちた小車でニーナを押し潰す。さあ、誰が本当に悪者か見てみろ
description.koreana: 떨어지는 차가 니나를 깔아뭉개 죽입니다. 봐, 여기 나쁜 놈이 누구지?

description.english: Try to behead a zombie.
description.french: Essayez de décapiter un zombie.
description.german: Versuche, einen Zombie zu enthaupten
description.spanish: Trata de decapitar a un zombi.
description.portuguese: Tenta decapitar um zombie
description.schinese: 尝试斩首一个僵尸
description.tchinese: 嘗試斬首一個僵屍
description.japanese: ゾンビの首を切り落とそうとする
